headline.main: REICH TO REVAMP SOVIET INDUSTRY; Task of Exploitation is Begun With Naming of Chief for Occupied Territory

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 23 -- The announcement of Dr. Alfred Rosenberg's appointment to the new post of Reich Minister for Occupied Russian Territory has offered official circles in the German press a new pretext for directing the interests of business toward the gigantic task of exploiting the vast Russian "hinterland" in the interests of German and European economy.
